alert_bridge=Bridge Mode requires at least 2 network cards!
alert_mirrors_for_feedback=<span class="hot"> When binding multiple mirror ports, the default return port is at the mirror port. It is detected that you have bound the return port and it is recommended to delete it! </span> Confirm to delete?
alert_bind_mirrors=<span class="hot">In the multi-mirror collection environment, the separate hits must be forwarded by the switch. </span>Confirm to continue?
skip=ignore

desc_nicbind=1. NIC-WAN: If you use a separate external line to access the Internet, you need to add a WAN. <br> 2. NIC-LAN: generally do not bind this port, in a multi-machine cluster, using the LAN as a disk communication port.

get_gateway_mac=Get Current Gateway MAC
tip_vlanid=Range 2~4095, used only when the switch disables VLAN 1. If 0 is disabled, double-layer QINQ VLAN is represented in x.y format.
tip2_vlanid=Range 2~4095, only used when the switch disables VLAN 1. 0 means not enabled
show_pro_settings=Show Advanced Settings...
confirm_vlanid=<span class="hot">You set the VLAN ID to: <span class="color4">{0}</span>, which may prevent you from accessing Web Administration (you can enter console settings). If you do not know the operation, please do not arbitrarily modify it. <br>Confirm the modification of VLAN ID? </span>
warn_ip_range=<span class="hot">Warning: To prevent conflicts with the secondary route IP, it is recommended not to set the hit port to the 192.168.0.0/24 network segment. </span><br>I understand and need to set!
change_ip=Change IP

desc_network_mirror=1. Same route: The packet return data reaches the user directly through the switch (usually a Layer 2 environment). <br>2. Cross-route: Packet data is forwarded to the user through the gateway (usually a three-tier environment). Forwarding is determined by the static routing table. <br>3. Mirroring traffic replication: copy the mirrored traffic to a specified network card at the same time, and the received network card can be multiple. <a class="link need-reload" href="{0}">Click here to view Mirror traffic</a>.
td_net_topology_type=Network Topology Type:
td_net_option=Network Options:
td_mirror_copy=Mirror Traffic Copy:
td_is_active=Activate:
desc_same_route=Same route<span class="mark">(user network and the same router as this machine)</span>
desc_cross_route=Cross route <span class="mark">(User network and local machine are not in the same routing area, independent BRAS system, and there is no NAT on BRAS)</span>
desc_has_pppoe=Whether to join the PPPoE layer <span class="mark">(Force the PPPoE data layer when back package)</span>
desc_has_vlan=Whether to join the VLAN layer <span class="mark">(Force the VLAN data layer when adding packets)</span>
actived=Activated
unactive=Unactivated
name=Name
nic=NIC
topology_type=Topology Type
in_pppoe=Add to PPPoE
in_vlan=Add to VLan
vlanid=VLAN ID
mirror_copy=Mirror Traffic Copy
is_active=Is Active
same_route=Same Route
cross_route=Cross Route

h3_pppoe_log=#Dial Log
desc_network_pppoe=Description: Allows the caching system to connect to the PPPoE server through dial-up networking. This applies only when the intranet is a pure PPPoE dial-up connection. In addition, you need to assign a fixed IP for cached dialing on the PPPoE server and set the preferred DNS assigned to the PPPoE client to this IP.
h3_params_config=#Settings
td_ppp_username=Dial User Name:
td_ppp_password=Dial Password:
td_ppp_service_name=PPPoE Service Name:
td_ppp_option=Dial Configuration:
tip_ppp_password=Please leave blank if you do not change your password
tip_ppp_service_name=Please leave blank if there is no service name
ppp_option1=Modify the system default route after successful dialing
ppp_option2=Automatically Start Dialing
ppp_option3=Enable Debug
ppp_option4=Specify the PPPoE Service Name

desc_wan_pppoe_vlan=VLAN_ID MAC_Address Account_Name Password MTU MRU Optional_Remarks
desc_wan_vlan_input=One configuration per line. Each configuration item is separated by a space. The format is as follows:

ppp_link_dev=PPP Name/Device
ip_mac=IP Address/MAC
device=Device
dns=DNS
ppp_username=Dial User Name

td_downlimit=Max Down Bandwidth:
tip_wan_weight=Range: 1~100, indicating the percentage of the line load
tip_uplimit=0 means unlimited
tip_downlimit=0 means unlimited

mem_chart=Memory Usage Graph
mem_use=Memory Usage

sys_avg_load_chart=System Average Load Graph
avg_load=Average load
desc_sys_avg_load=1. Average load is a comprehensive indicator of system pressure. Usually, a load greater than 5 indicates a high load, 1 to 5 medium, or less than 1 light, and an average load under normal conditions should be less than 2. <br>2. Disk IO is a part of the CPU load. If the long term is greater than 30%, it indicates that the system has abnormal read/write operations to the disk, or the disk itself has a problem.

Specify a unique identification name, can keep the login address fixed, starting with a letter, the following characters can be letters, numbers, underscore (_), dash (-), the length must not exceed 32 characters .

desc_live_source=1. This system supports HTTP, UDP, RTP, RTSP, RTMP format source, support unicast output or multicast output (non-shared source), support Live-Record (non-carousel). <br>2. Review function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click here to configure storage disk</a></span> . The size of the occupied hard disk depends on the live source stream. Taking 8 Mbps as an example, each channel needs about 80 G per day. <br> 3. The intranet web player only supports H.264+AAC encoding source, it is recommended to use computer client or APP player.
desc_live_source_no_record=1. This system supports HTTP, UDP, RTP, RTSP, RTMP format source, support unicast output or multicast output (non-shared source). <br>2. The intranet web player only supports H.264+AAC encoding source, it is recommended to use computer client or APP player.

desc_vod_settings=1. Local video requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click to configure storage disk</a></span>. The system simplifies operations by sharing the management of local video. <br><div class="pl15">Step 1: Enter <span class="hot">\\Local IP</span> (eg <span class="hot" in explorer or run >\\192.168.1.250</span>), confirm and enter your password, <a class="link" href="images/demo/open-share.png" target="_blank">click here to see an example</a> . <br>Step 2: After the video is transmitted to the server, click <span class="hot">Scan Video</span> to generate the video and carousel data here. (The carousel data is recommended to be placed under the upload level 2 directory, otherwise you need to manually fill in the path, such as: <span class="hot">upload\Movies\Bruce lee</span>). </div>2. The intranet web player supports only H.264+AAC encoded mp4 files. The APP supports most common formats (depending on the hardware decoding capability), such as mp4, mkv, rmvb, avi, and so on.

desc_live_user=1. Please add user groups and select the corresponding channel. The user group ID length is 5, such as <span class="green">10000</span>; the user ID length is 6, such as <span class="color4">100001</span>. <br>2. APP login name equals user group ID + user ID. For example: if the user group ID is <span class="green">10000</span> and the user ID is <span class="color4">100001</span>, the login user name is <span class="green"> 10000</span><span class="color4">100001</span><br>3. The default user account is (<span class="green">10000</span><span class="color4">100001 </span>) If the system detects that the default account does not exist, it will automatically create a default account. If you do not want to enable this account, you can disable it.

desc_app_upgrade_push2=<span class="hot">APP supports online config</span>. After selecting push or configuration, it will automatically download the app from the official website and write it to the push data. <br>
desc_app_upgrade_push3_for_itv=APP supports playing start video. Simply transfer the video to be played to the shared root directory and rename it to <span class="hot">hotel_start.mp4</span> (<span class="hot">not to exceed 300MB , otherwise it will not play </span>).

desc_boot_video_settings=1. A video can be played when the APP starts up. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">,<a class="link" href="{0}">Click to configure the storage disk</a></span>. The format is mp4 and cannot exceed 300MB, otherwise it may not be able to play. <br> 2. After starting the video change or delete, it will take two restarts to take effect.
upload_boot_video=Upload Startup Video
del_boot_video=Delete Startup Video
deleting_boot_video=Deleting startup video, please wait...
confirm_del_boot_video=Confirm delete startup video? You need to restart APP 2 times to take effect after deleting.

failed_play_audio=The audio does not exist or your browser does not support playing the audio format.
failed_play_video=The video does not exist or your browser does not support playing the video format.

desc_boot_logo_settings=The LOGO image can be displayed when the device starts. This function requires hard disk support <span class="need-admin">, <a class="link" href="{0}">Click to configure the storage disk</a> </span>. The format is a JPG image, valid only for the supported firmware (official set top box or TV).

del_boot_logo=Delete Boot LOGO
deleting_boot_logo=Deleting boot LOGO, please wait...

td_boot_animation_height=Display Height:

td_boot_animation_count=Play Count:
tip_boot_animation_count=0-10, 0 means loop playback
tip_boot_animation_width=100-3840px
tip_boot_animation_height=100-2160px
tip_boot_animation_speed=1-30
tip_boot_animation_time=Video clipped, 1-10 seconds
td_boot_animation_mp4=One MP4 file (up to 50M)
td_boot_animation_gif=A GIF image (up to 10M)
td_boot_animation_jpg=Multiple JPG pictures (single image not exceeding 1M)
td_boot_animation_png=Multiple PNG pictures (single image not exceed 1M)

After the background music is changed or deleted, the welcome page needs to be access for 2 times to take effect..
